title: MySQL latest Dev Branch Concurrency Error
author: medusaalb
body_snippet:
I'm working mRemoteNG lastest branch and i'm getting this error :
----------
----------
ErrorMsg
02/18/2021 12:55:01
Couldn't save connections file as ""!
Concurrency violation: the batched command affected 0 of the expected 1000 records.
----------

----------
We are 10 persons working in that database

thanks in advanced

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.2
